#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define lli int

using namespace std;

long long int mod = 1000000007;

lli dp[201][101][101][4];

lli solve(lli n, lli b, lli run, lli dot)
{
    lli a = 0, a1 = 0, a2 = 0, a3 = 0, a4 = 0, a5= 0, a6=0, a7=0, a8=0, a9=0, a10 = 0;
   // cout<<n<<" "<<b<<" "<<run<<" "<<dot<<endl;
    if(dot > 2 || n < 0 || b < 0) {
        return 0;
    }
    if(n==0){
        if(run >= 100){
            return 1;
        }
        return 0;
    }

    if(run>=100) {
        return 1;
    }

    if (dp[n][b][run][dot] != -1) {
        return dp[n][b][run][dot];
    }

    a1 = solve(n, b - 1, run, dot);
    a2 = solve(n, b - 1, run + 1, dot);
    a3 = solve(n, b - 1, run + 2, dot);
    a4 = solve(n, b - 1, run + 4, dot);
    a5 = solve(n, b - 1, run + 6, dot);
    a6 = solve(n - 1, b, run, dot + 1);
    a7 = solve(n - 1, b, run + 1, 0);
    a8 = solve(n - 1, b, run + 2, 0);
    a9 = solve(n - 1, b, run + 4, 0);
    a10 = solve(n - 1, b, run + 6, 0);

    dp[n][b][run][dot] = (((((((((a1+a2)%mod+a3)%mod+a4)%mod+a5)%mod+a6)%mod+a7)%mod+a8)%mod+a9)%mod+a10)%mod;

    return dp[n][b][run][dot];
}

int main()
{
    //freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);
    lli t, n, b, k, i, j, l, ans;

    for (i = 0; i < 201; i++) {
        for (j = 0; j < 101; j++) {
            for (k = 0; k < 101; k++) {
                for (l = 0; l < 4; l++) {
                    dp[i][j][k][l] = -1;
                }
            }
        }
    }

    cin>>t;
    while(t--) {
        cin>>n>>b;
        //cout<<n<<" "<<b<<endl;
        ans = solve(n, b, 0, 0);
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
